content: this gorgeous lenny hat has a great texture and works up quickly it is the perfect compliment to the lenny cowl this pattern is one of the december contributions to the 2024 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** approximately 32-170 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn in 3 colors i used big twist premium yarn size i 5 5 mm furls streamline crochet hook yarn needle for weaving ends scissors
